title: Crime Alert 04.11.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.11.19
description:
37-year-old Michigan man faces life in prison after attempting to kidnap a motel desk clerk. Arrest of serial killer uncovers promising details on multiple deaths in Toronto. And in Niagara Falls – an urgent care doctor accused of having sexual contact with a 17-year-old patient.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
